Package com.thoughtworks.robot.exception

Exception Summary
InvalidDirectionCodeException This exception will be used to notify an Exception situation where program/code have got an invalid Direction.
InvalidLocationString This exception will be used to notify an Exception situation where program/code has received an invalid location string.
InvalidMoveCodeException This exception will be used to notify an exception situation where program/code has received an invalid Move code.
OutOfPlateuaException This exception will be used to notify an exception situation when Robot will try to go beyond the MAX/MIN(0, 0) limit of Plateau.
RobotOverlapException A Plateau can allow/disallow two Robot to share same coordinate and this can be controlled by an instance variable allowRobotOverlap in Plateau.This exception will be used to notify an exception situation when a Robot will try to occupy a coordinate which is already occupied by another Robot on same Plateau and Plateau does not allow sharing of same coordinates by two Robots.
